subject: Baseball
Helmets
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Some major league players don’t want to sacrifice comfort and style for the protection of a new Rawlings helmet, which can withstand the impact of a 100-m.p.h. fastball.
snippet: Some major league players don’t want to sacrifice comfort and style for the protection of a new Rawlings helmet, which can withstand the impact of a 100-m.p.h. fastball.
